ADDDATA.TITLE: Add a data source
ADDDATA.CONTENT:
To add a file or free content
-Click the Add button then Data
-Select the type of data (free content or PDF file)
-Click Validate, the indexing status will be displayed in the bell icon at the top
-The file will appear in All your data in the left sidebar

ADDCAT.TITLE: Add a category (BETA)
ADDCAT.CONTENT:
To add a category or free content
-Select the parent category in the left panel
-Click the Add button then Category
-Enter the category title
-Click Validate
-The category will appear in All your data in the left sidebar

SEARCH.TITLE: Ask/search data
SEARCH.CONTENT:
Click on the AI Search tab in the right panel, then:
-To search the entire database, uncheck the files (if any) then enter your query in the search box at the bottom of the right panel
-To search a specific file, check the desired file then enter your query in the search box at the bottom of the right panel
Documents related to your query will be displayed in the AI selection menu in the left panel.

ADDPROMPT.TITLE: Create/edit a prompt
ADDPROMPT.CONTENT:
Click on the Settings tab in the left menu then:
-Select the prompts tab
-Add or edit a prompt using the add or edit specific row button.
A default prompt is defined, it cannot be modified
You can select the desired prompt in AI Search in the list to the left of the search box.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: Suggest an improvement / Report a bug / Contact

WELCOME.TEXT: What do you want to find in your data?

WELCOMENODATA.TEXT: There is no data in your index, start by adding some by clicking the 'Add' button

TEXT_FILTER.TITLE: All the content you add to your index (if a filter is applied, the count may differ)

ALL_DATAS.TITLE: All the content you add to your index (if a filter is applied, the count may differ)

PRESET.TITLE: Sources selected related to your question/query.
